    • getMostInfluentialPlayer

      protected Player getMostInfluentialPlayer(Player currentPlayer, Island island)
      Calculates for every player the influence on each (group of) island.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The current player who has moved mother nature
      island - The Island where mother nature has ended her movement
      Returns:
      The most influential player on the specified island, the one who builds the tower
